name: The Solstice Kiss
description:
“I know it’s been a hard few months…but I’m hoping this will be a fresh start for you! Some of my fondest memories are from Brightwood.”

After a rough patch at home, and being convinced by her mother, Juno heads back to her family cottage in a small town called Brightwood. There’s no better distraction than the annual Winter Solstice Festival, which is approaching far too quickly for the new mayor.

Help Juno get her all-but-abandoned cottage fixed up, make new friends, plan for the festival, and ultimately find love.

Your choices will decide if Juno can finally find someone to call home after all she’s been through.

 

* This game is a submission to the Winter Visual Novel Jam 2022 ending December 31st. Make sure to follow for future updates and new content in the coming months! We ARE reading the comments so please let us know how you think the game can be improved or just leave some love! THANKS FOR PLAYING!

 

30 minutes of playtime per ending
All Female Dev Team
2 Love interests to choose from (male/female)
3 Possible Endings
Original Art
Bisexual Female Protagonist and Trans Female Support Character
Text-to-speech option by pressing ‘V’ upon starting!
Safe to stream or record for Twitch and YouTube (including music)!

 

“Elli” on Direction, Programming, & Writing
“Zalta” on Backgrounds & Character Art
Kim “Koko” on Production & Writing
